attributes.action: MPs to hold monthly public meetings to understand the views of constituents.
attributes.additional_details:
Every MP to hold a monthly public meeting to understand the views and requirements of their constituents. Minutes to be accurately recorded and published.
Only then will the prevailing Government, and their opposition parties, better understand how the public is feeling and take appropriate action.
attributes.background: Recent events have clearly shown that politicians from all parties do not understand the views and requirements of the voting public.

rejection.details: It's up to individual MPs to decide how they want to carry out their constituency duties.
